questions.question_text: Bhagwānnā bhaktanā drohe karīne jevu ā 			thây chhe ne e jīvne kașht thāy chhe tevu koī pāpe karīne nathī thatu.
questions.explanation: According to Vach.Ga.Ma.40, Bhagwānnā bhaktanā drohe karīne jevu ā jīvnu bhūndu thây chhe ne e jīvne kașht thāy chhe tevu koī pāpe karīne nathī thatu.

questions.question_text: Bhagwānnā bhaktanī mane, vachane, dehe karīne je sevā banī āve ne tene karīne jevu ā 			thây chhe ne e jīvne sukh thây chhe tevu bīje koī sādhane karīne nathī thatu.
questions.explanation: According to Vach.Ga.Ma.40, Bhagwānnā bhaktanī mane, vachane, dehe karīne je sevā banī āve ne tene karīne jevu ā jīvnu rūdu thây chhe ne e jīvne sukh thây chhe tevu bīje koī sādhane karīne nathī thatu.

questions.question_text: Māte jene dehe karīne param sukhiyā thavu hoy ne deh mūkyā kede pan param sukhiya thavu hoy, tene Bhagwānnā bhaktano mane, vachane, dehe karīne 			.
questions.explanation: According to Vach.Ga.Ma.40, Māte jene dehe karīne param sukhiyā thavu hoy ne deh mūkyā kede pan param sukhiya thavu hoy, tene Bhagwānnā bhaktano mane, vachane, dehe karīne droh na karavo.
